title: FLEX WEDNESDAY
description: FLEX WEDNESDAY clearing my head by taking flex days off work for longer bike rides of the region #flexwednesday   -  Bike riding is of course allowed any day of the week

home.title: FLEX WEDNESDAY
home.description: Work life messes with the head.  To clear my mind I take flex days on a Wednesday for longer bike rides through the region, postponing flipping my wig.   Other days of the week are permitted!
